actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary, S. Rept. 93-1023.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 15461 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to secure to the Congress additional time in which to consider the proposed amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure which the Chief of Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court transmitted to the Congress on April 22, 1974.

summary.text: Provides that the effective date of the proposed amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure which the Chief Justice of the United States Supreme Court transmitted to the Congress on April 22, 1974 shall be postponed until August 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to secure to the Congress additional time in which to consider the proposed amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure which the Chief of Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court transmitted to the Congress on April 22, 1974.
